name: Into The Vortex (Desolate Sole Games)
description:
Work your way through a series of expanding mazes, traversing both 2D and 3D puzzles to locate the end of each level. Each time you smash the number of moves needed on a few levels the grid size will increase.

Increase your score by using as few moves as possible and beat the number of moves used by the maze generator.

Currently only the continuous game and "no move counter" games are working, the "10 level challenge" is yet to be implemented, and high scores are only local.

Disclaimer: There may also be some bugs, especially at higher grid sizes.
